===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# [[protectorate]] {{qualifier|a type of regional government primarily established during the Han and Tang dynasties}}

====Usage notes====
The term could refer to any of the number of regional governments established during the Han and Tang dynasties, such as {{zh-l|西域都護府|tr=xīyù dūhùfǔ}} ([[w:Protectorate of the Western Regions|Protectorate of the Western Regions]]), {{zh-l|安西都護府|tr=ānxī dūhùfǔ}} ([[w:Protectorate General to Pacify the West|Protectorate General to Pacify the West]]), {{zh-l|安東都護府|tr=āndōng dūhùfǔ}} ([[w:Protectorate General to Pacify the East|Protectorate General to Pacify the East]]), {{zh-l|安北都護府|tr=ānběi dūhùfǔ}} ([[w:Protectorate General to Pacify the North|Protectorate General to Pacify the North]]), {{zh-l|安南都護府|tr=ānnán dūhùfǔ}} ([[w:Protectorate General to Pacify the South|Protectorate General to Pacify the South]]) or {{zh-l|北庭都護府|tr=běitíng dūhùfǔ}} ([[w:Protectorate General to Pacify Beiting|Protectorate General to Pacify Beiting]]).
